propositions.text: The document is titled "嫡女不得宠".
The document contains sections labeled from "001" to "111".

concepts.name: 嫡女不得宠
concepts.context: This is the title of the document and is also repeated within comments in each section.

concepts.name: Section Number
concepts.context: Each section is identified by a numerical label from 001 to 111.

concepts.name: Comment
concepts.context: Each section contains multiple HTML comments, all repeating the phrase "嫡女不得宠".

hierarchy.structure: The document has a main title and is then divided into sequentially numbered sections. Each section contains repetitive comments related to the title.
